role.title: Director of Operations
role.description: This role oversees all actions carried out within Andela

role.title: Operations Associate
role.description: This role manages the in flow and outflow of assets within Activo

role.title: Operations Coordinator
role.description: This role manages the in flow and outflow of assets and stock positions within Activo

role.title: Operations Manager
role.description: This role oversees the activities of the Operations Associate and Operations Coordinator

role.title: Activo Developer
role.description: A member of the Activo developer team

role.title: Office Assistant
role.description: This role incharge of keeping records and sorting checks of assets

role.title: Operations Intern
role.description: This role work with Operations staff to complete independent projects and/or provide support
